pages.text: 74|48|Phale suparisakaridera suparisa tadera kono upakara karabe na [1].
74|49|Atahpara tadera ki hayeche ye, tara mukha phiriye neya upadesa hate
74|50|tara yena bhita-trasta haye palayanarata ekapala gadha
74|51|yara sinhera bhaye palayana kareche [1].
74|52|Baram tadera madhyakara pratyeke'i kamana kare ye, take ekati unmukta grantha deya hoka [1].
74|53|Kakhano naya [1]; baram tara akheratake bhaya kare na [2].
74|54|Niscaya e kura'ana to sakalera jan'ya upadesabani [1].
74|55|Ata'eba yara icche se ta theke upadesa grahana karuka.
74|56|Ara allahara icche chara ke'u upadesa grahana karate pare na; tini'i yogya ye, ekamatra tamra'i taka'oya abalambana kara habe, ara tini'i ksama karara adhikari [1].
75|1|Ami sapatha karachi kiyamatera dinera [1]
75|2|ami ara'o sapatha karachi bhartsanakari atmara [1].
75|3|Manusa ki mane kare ye, amara kakhano'i tara asthisamuha ekatra karate paraba na
75|4|abasya'i hyam, amara tara angulera aga paryanta punarbin'yasta karate saksama [1].
75|5|Baram manusa tara bhabisyate'o papacara karate caya [1].
75|6|Se prasna kare, ‘kakhana kiyamatera dina asabe?’
75|7|Yakhana cokha sthira haye yabe [1]
75|8|ebam camda haye parabe kiranahina [1]
75|9|ara yakhana surya o camdake ekatra kara habe [1] –
75|10|sedina manusa balabe, ‘aja palanora sthana kothaya?’
75|11|Kakhano'i naya, kono asrayasthala ne'i.
75|12|Sedina thami habe apanara rabera'i kache.
75|13|Sedina manusake abahita kara habe se ki age pathiyeche o ki pichane rekhe geche [1].
75|14|Baram manusa nijera samparke samyaka abagata [1]
75|15|Yadi'o se nana ajuhatera abatarana kare.
75|16|Taratari ohi ayatta karara jan'ya apani ta niye apanara jihbake druta sancalana karabena na.
75|17|Niscaya era sanraksana o patha karanora dayitba amadera'i.
75|18|Kaje'i yakhana amara ta patha kari apani se pathera anusarana karuna
75|19|tarapara tara barnanara dayitba niscitabhabe amadera'i [1].
